title: A bill to establish the Nicodemus National Historic Site in Kansas, and for other purposes.
content: Establishes the Nicodemus National Historic Site in Nicodemus, Kansas. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) provide technical assistance for the preservation of historic structures, the maintenance of the cultural landscape, and local preservation planning. And (2) acquire certain real property in connection with the Site. Directs the Secretary to: (1) prepare a general management plan for the Site. And (2) submit a copy of the plan to specified congressional committees. Authorizes appropriations.
